member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetManager
member.summary: The interface that is implemented by the WidgetManager class, which provides methods for querying, updating and deleting widgets.

member.summary: Interface definition of the DeleteWidget(String) method.
member.param: A widget ID.

member.summary: Interface definition of the GetWidgetIds method.
member.returns: An array of widget IDs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetManager.GetWidgetInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Interface definition of the GetWidgetInfo(String) method.
member.param: The widget ID.
member.returns: A WidgetInfo object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetManager.GetWidgetInfos
member.summary: Interface definition of the GetWidgetInfos method.
member.returns: An array of WidgetInfo objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetManager.UpdateWidget(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetUpdateRequestOptions)
member.summary: Interface definition of the UpdateWidget(WidgetUpdateRequestOptions) method.
member.param: A WidgetUpdateRequestOptions object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider
member.summary: This interface is implemented by Windows Widget providers to receive callbacks from the widget host for widget lifetime events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.Activate(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext)
member.summary: Notifies the widget provider that the widget host is currently interested in receiving updated content from the provider.
member.param: A WidgetContext object that identifies the widget that is being activated and provides configuration information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.CreateWidget(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext)
member.summary: Notifies the widget provider that a new widget has been created, for example, when a user adds a widget to a widget host.
member.param: A WidgetContext object that identifies the widget that is being created and provides information about the configuration of the widget.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.Deactivate(System.String)
member.summary: Notifies the widget provider that the widget host is no longer actively requesting updated content from the provider.
member.param: The unique identifier of the widget that is being deactivated. The widget ID value is dynamically generated by the WidgetManager. The widget ID remains the same for a widget from the moment of its creation until the moment the Widget is deleted. The widget ID is a unique value across all widgets and all widget providers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.DeleteWidget(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Notifies the widget provider that one of the widgets it supports has been deleted, for example, when a user removes a widget from a widget host.
member.param: The unique identifier of the widget that is being unpinned. The widget ID value is dynamically generated by the WidgetManager. The widget ID remains the same for a widget from the moment of its creation until the moment the Widget is deleted. The widget ID is a unique value across all widgets and all widget providers.
A string containing the custom state of the widget that has been unpinned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.OnActionInvoked(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs)
member.summary: Called when an action is invoked on a widget, such as the user clicking on a button.
member.param: A WidgetActionInvokedArgs object providing data for the callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider.OnWidgetContextChanged(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContextChangedArgs)
member.summary: Called when the configuration of the widget within the widget host changes.
member.param: A WidgetContextChangedArgs object providing data for the callback.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider2
member.summary: This interface is implemented by Windows widget providers to receive callbacks from the widget host for widget customization events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProvider2.OnCustomizationRequested(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetCustomizationRequestedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the user has requested widget customization through the widget host UI.
member.param: A WidgetCustomizationRequestedArgs object providing access to the widget context and custom state.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProviderAnalytics
member.summary: This optional interface can be implemented by Windows widget providers to receive callbacks from the widget host for widget analytics events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProviderAnalytics.OnAnalyticsInfoReported(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the widget host reports analytics data associated with a user interaction with a widget.
member.param: A WidgetAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs that provides details about the user interaction that triggered the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProviderErrors
member.summary: This interface is implemented by Windows widget providers to receive callbacks from the widget host for widget errors.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.IWidgetProviderErrors.OnErrorInfoReported(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetErrorInfoReportedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the widget host reports a widget error.
member.param: A WidgetErrorInfoReportedArgs that provides details about the error that triggered the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the OnActionInvoked(WidgetActionInvokedArgs) callback, which is raised when an action is invoked on a widget, such as the user clicking on a button.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs.CustomState
member.summary: Gets a string containing custom state for the widget associated with the action.
member.returns: A string containing custom state for the widget associated with the action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs.Data
member.summary: Gets a JSON string containing key/value pairs representing the data associated with the action.
member.returns: A JSON string containing representing the data associated with the action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs.Verb
member.summary: Gets a string that indicates the verb associated with the associated action.
member.returns: A string that indicates the verb associated with the associated action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetActionInvokedArgs.WidgetContext
member.summary: Gets a WidgetContext object containing information about the configuration of the associated widget in the widget host.
member.returns: A WidgetContext object containing information about the configuration of the associated widget in the widget host.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the OnAnalyticsInfoReported event which is raised when the widget host reports analytics data associated with a user interaction with a widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs.AnalyticsJson
member.summary: Gets a JSON string describing the user interaction that triggered the analytics event.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs.WidgetContext
member.summary: Gets the WidgetContext object associated with the analytics info. This object provides information about the configuration of a widget within the widget host.
member.returns: The WidgetContext object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext
member.summary: Provides information about the configuration of a widget within the widget host.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext.DefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the identifier registered by the widget provider to categorize the widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the widget associated with the WidgetContext.
member.returns: The ID of the widget associated with the WidgetContext.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext.IsActive
member.summary: Gets the activation state of the widget.
member.returns: True if the widget is active; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetContext.Size
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the currently displayed size of the widget.
member.returns: A <Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.WidgetSize> indicating the currently displayed size of the widget.

member.summary: Provides data for the OnWidgetContextChanged(WidgetContextChangedArgs) callback.

member.summary: Gets the WidgetContext object associated with the OnWidgetContextChanged(WidgetContextChangedArgs) callback.
member.returns: A WidgetContext object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetCustomizationRequestedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the OnCustomizationRequested event which is raised when the user has requested widget customization through the widget host UI.

member.summary: Gets a string containing custom state for the widget associated with the customization request.
member.returns: A string containing custom state for the widget associated with the action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetCustomizationRequestedArgs.WidgetContext
member.summary: Gets the WidgetContext object associated with the customization request. This object provides information about the configuration of a widget within the widget host.
member.returns: The WidgetContext object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetErrorInfoReportedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the OnErrorInfoReported event which is raised when the widget host reports a widget error.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetErrorInfoReportedArgs.ErrorJson
member.summary: Gets a JSON string describing the error that triggered the error event.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetErrorInfoReportedArgs.WidgetContext
member.summary: Gets the WidgetContext object associated with the error. This object provides information about the configuration of a widget within the widget host.
member.returns: The WidgetContext object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetInfo
member.summary: Contains status information for a widget, including the visual template, data template, custom state, the last update time, and context information from the widget host.

member.summary: Gets a string containing the current Adaptive Card JSON data template for the widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetInfo.Data
member.summary: Gets a string containing the current Adaptive Card JSON data template for the widget.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetInfo.LastUpdateTime
member.summary: Gets the time that the widget was last updated.
member.returns: The time that the widget was last updated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetInfo.Template
member.summary: Gets a string containing the current Adaptive Card JSON visual template for the widget.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetInfo.WidgetContext
member.summary: Gets a WidgetContext object containing information about the configuration of a widget within the widget host.
member.returns: A WidgetContext object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager
member.summary: Provides methods for querying, updating, and deleting widgets.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.DeleteWidget(System.String)
member.summary: Requests the removal of a widget from the widget host.
member.param: The unique identifier of the widget to remove. The widget ID value is dynamically generated by the WidgetManager. The widget ID remains the same for a widget from the moment of its creation until the moment the Widget is deleted. The widget ID is a unique value across all widgets and all widget providers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.GetDefault
member.summary: Gets an instance of the WidgetManager class.
member.returns: An instance of WidgetManager.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.GetWidgetIds
member.summary: Gets all of the widget IDs for widgets associated with the calling provider app.
member.returns: An array of strings containing the widget IDs for widgets associated with the calling provider app.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.GetWidgetInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a WidgetInfo object containing information about the widget with the provided widget ID, including the visual template, data template, custom state, the last update time, and context information from the widget host.
member.param: The unique identifier of the widget for which information is retrieved.
member.returns: A WidgetInfo object, if the specified ID is associated with a widget associated with the calling app that has not been deleted; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.GetWidgetInfos
member.summary: Gets the stored information for all widgets associated with the calling app.
member.returns: An array of WidgetInfo objects containing information about the associated widgets.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetManager.UpdateWidget(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetUpdateRequestOptions)
member.summary: Provides updated content for a widget to the widget host.
member.param: A WidgetUpdateRequestOptions object that contains the content with which to update the widget.

member.summary: Provides data for calls to UpdateWidget(WidgetUpdateRequestOptions).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetUpdateRequestOptions.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the Adaptive Card data template for the associated widget.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Providers.WidgetUpdateRequestOptions.Template
member.summary: Gets or sets the Adaptive Card visual template for the associated widget.

member.summary: Gets the widget ID of the widget to be updated.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement
member.summary: Provides data for a feed announcement that a feed provider can request to be displayed by calling <Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.TryShowAnnouncement(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement)>.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,Windows.Foundation.Uri,Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FeedAnnouncement class.
member.param: A required unique identifier for the announcement.
The required primary text for the announcement.
The required secondary text for the announcement.
The required icon URI for the light mode OS theme.
The required icon URI for the dark mode OS theme.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.CustomAccessibilityText
member.summary: Gets or sets custom accessibility text is announced by screen readers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.DarkModeIconUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the required icon URI for the dark mode OS theme, which will be displayed on the notification if the current OS theme is dark.
member.returns: The dark mode icon URI.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional duration value, specifying how long the announcement will be displayed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.ExpirationTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional expiration time for the announcement.
member.returns: The expiration time for the announcement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a required unique identifier for the announcement.
member.returns: The unique identifier for the announcement.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.IsSecondaryTextSubtle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating wether the SecondaryText string is displayed with subtle formatting to appear less prominent.
member.returns: True if the secondary text should be displayed with subtle formatting; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the required icon URI for the light mode OS theme, which will be displayed on the notification if the current OS theme is light.
member.returns: The light mode icon URI.

member.summary: Gets or sets the required primary text for the announcement.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the PrimaryText string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement.ShowBadgeIfUserNotEngaged
member.summary: Gets or sets a value field indicating whether a badge should be displayed on the baseline announcement if the user has not engaged with the announcement. Default value will be false.
member.returns: True if a badge should be displayed on the baseline announcement; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager
member.summary: Provides methods for feed providers to manage and query feeds.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.GetDefault
member.summary: Gets the default instance of the FeedManager for the calling feed provider app.
member.returns: An instance of FeedManager.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.GetEnabledFeedProviders
member.summary: Gets a list of FeedProviderInfo objects representing the enabled feed providers associated with the calling feed provider app.
member.returns: A list of enabled feed providers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.SendMessageToContent(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send a string message to the web content in a feed being displayed in the feeds host.
member.param: The definition ID of the feed provider. This is the value specified in the Id attribute of the FeedProvider element in the provider's package manifest file. For more information see Feed provider package manifest XML format.

The definition ID of the feed. This is the value specified in the Id attribute of the Definition element in the provider's package manifest file. For more information see Feed provider package manifest XML format.
A string containing the message to be sent to the feed web content.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.SetCustomQueryParameters(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.CustomQueryParametersUpdateOptions)
member.summary: Sets the query parameters that are passed to the remote feed provider URI when the Widgets Board is requesting feed content. This enables scenarios like passing authentication tokens to the remote service.
member.param: A CustomQueryParametersUpdateOptions object that conveys the query parameters and related metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedManager.TryShowAnnouncement(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement)
member.summary: Requests that an announcement be shown in the taskbar. The feeds host may or may not show this announcement, based on its policies. If the user interacts with the announcement, the feed provider's OnAnnouncementInvoked(FeedAnnouncementInvokedArgs) method will be called.
member.param: The definition ID of the feed provider. This is the value specified in the Id attribute of the FeedProvider element in the provider's package manifest file. For more information see Feed provider package manifest XML format.

The definition ID of the feed. This is the value specified in the Id attribute of the Definition element in the provider's package manifest file. For more information see Feed provider package manifest XML format.
A FeedAnnouncement object that provides the data for the announcement to be displayed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedMessageReceivedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the FeedMessageReceivedArgs JavaScript method.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedMessageReceivedArgs.FeedDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the definition ID of the feed associated with the message.
member.returns: The definition ID of the feed associated with the message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedMessageReceivedArgs.FeedProviderDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the definition ID of the feed provider associated with the message.
member.returns: The definition ID of the feed provider associated with the message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedMessageReceivedArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets a string containing the contents of the message that was posted from the feed's content using the window.chrome.webview.postMessage JavaScript method
member.returns: A string containing the contents of the message

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedProviderInfo
member.summary: Provides information about a feed provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedProviderInfo.EnabledFeedDefinitionIds
member.summary: Gets a list of unique identifiers for feeds, as specified in the app manifest of the feed provider app.
member.returns: A list of strings containing feed IDs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedProviderInfo.FeedProviderDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the feed provider, as specified in the app manifest of the feed provider app.
member.returns: A string containing the ID of the feed provider.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequest
member.summary: Represents a resource request received through an implementation of IFeedResourceProvider.OnResourceRequested.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequest.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the stream of content that is provided in a PUT or UPDATE feed resource request.
member.returns: The stream of content that is provided in a PUT or UPDATE feed resource request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequest.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets a dictionary of header values that can be used to in a feed resource request.
member.returns: A dictionary of header values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets the HTTP method of the feed resource request.
member.returns: A string value that may be "GET", "PUT", or "UPDATE".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequest.Uri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the requested resource.
member.returns: The URI of the requested resource.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the FeedResourceRequestedArgs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs.GetDeferral
member.summary: Informs the system that the resource response task might continue to perform work after the IFeedResourceProvider.OnResourceRequested
member.returns: A Deferral object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs.FeedDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the definition ID of the feed associated with the resource request.
member.returns: The definition ID of the feed associated with the resource request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs.FeedProviderDefinitionId
member.summary: Gets the definition ID of the feed provider associated with the resource request.
member.returns: The definition ID of the feed provider associated with the resource request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs.Request
member.summary: Sets the FeedResourceRequest representing the feed resource request.
member.returns: The feed resource request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs.Response
member.summary: Gets or sets the FeedResourceResponse representing the response to the feed resource request.
member.returns: The feed resource response.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse
member.summary: Represents a response to a resource request received through an implementation of IFeedResourceProvider.OnResourceRequested.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse.#ctor(Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStreamReference,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FeedResourceResponse class.
member.param: The stream of content that contains the requested resource.
A text description of the result that is not user facing.
The HTTP status code of the response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets the stream of content that contains the requested resource.
member.returns: The stream of content that contains the requested resource.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional dictionary of header values that may have been returned from a web request by the feed provider.
member.returns: A dictionary of header values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse.ReasonPhrase
member.summary: Gets a text description of the result that is not user facing.
member.returns: A text description of the result that is not user facing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets the HTTP status code of the response.
member.returns: The HTTP status code of the response.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedAnnouncementInvokedTarget
member.summary: The interface implemented by a feed provider to receive notifications when an announcement from the provider is displayed or when a user interacts with it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedAnnouncementInvokedTarget.OnAnnouncementInvoked(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncementInvokedArgs)
member.summary: Called by the feeds host when a feeds announcement, requested with a call to TryShowAnnouncement(FeedAnnouncement), has been initially displayed or interacted with by the user.
member.param: A FeedAnnouncementInvokedArgs object conveying identifiers for the announcement and the associated feed and the kind of action that triggered the notification.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager
member.summary: The interface implemented by the FeedManager class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager.GetEnabledFeedProviders
member.summary: Gets a list of FeedProviderInfo objects representing the enabled feed providers.
member.returns: A list of FeedProviderInfo objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager.SetCustomQueryParameters(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.CustomQueryParametersUpdateOptions)
member.summary: Updates the query parameters for a feed.
member.param: A CustomQueryParametersUpdateOptions containing the identifier for the feed provider and a string containing the query parameters to update.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager2
member.summary: An interface implemented by the FeedManager to enable additional features.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager2.SendMessageToContent(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Interface definition of a method that sends a string message to the web content in a feed being displayed in the feeds host.
member.param: The definition ID of the feed provider.
The definition ID of the feed.
The contents of the message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedManager2.TryShowAnnouncement(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Notifications.FeedAnnouncement)
member.summary: Interface definition of a method that requests that an announcement be shown in the feeds host.
member.param: The definition ID of the feed provider.
The definition ID of the feed.
A FeedAnnouncement object that provides the data for the announcement to be displayed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider
member.summary: The interface implemented by feed providers for the Windows Widgets Board. The methods of this interface are invoked by the Widgets Board to request custom query string parameters, typically to support authentication scenarios, and to provide telemetry information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider.OnCustomQueryParametersRequested(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.CustomQueryParametersRequestedArgs)
member.summary: Notifies the feed provider that the Widgets Board needs the the app to update a feed's custom query parameters. This occurs when a fetch of feed data fails due to due to an expired authentication token was set in a previous call to SetCustomQueryParameters(CustomQueryParametersUpdateOptions).
member.param: A CustomQueryParametersRequestedArgs that provides the ID for the feed for which query parameters are being requested. The ID is specified in the app manifest file for the feed provider app. For more information, see Feed provider package manifest XML format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider.OnFeedDisabled(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedDisabledArgs)
member.summary: Invoked by the Widgets Board when a feed is disabled.
member.param: A FeedDisabledArgs object that provides the feed ID and feed provider ID of the feed that has been disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider.OnFeedEnabled(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedEnabledArgs)
member.summary: Invoked by the Widgets Board when a feed is enabled.
member.param: A FeedEnabledArgs object that provides the feed ID and feed provider ID of the feed that has been enabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider.OnFeedProviderDisabled(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedProviderDisabledArgs)
member.summary: Invoked by the Widgets Board when all of the feeds for this provider have been disabled.
member.param: A FeedProviderDisabledArgs object that provides the feed provider ID of the feed provider that has been disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProvider.OnFeedProviderEnabled(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedProviderEnabledArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when a feed associated with the provider is created by the Widgets Board host.
member.param: A FeedProviderEnabledArgs object that provides the feed provider ID of the feed provider that has been enabled.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderAnalytics
member.summary: This optional interface can be implemented by feed providers to receive callbacks from the feeds host for feed analytics events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderAnalytics.OnAnalyticsInfoReported(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the feeds host reports analytics data associated with a user interaction with a feed.
member.param: A FeedAnalyticsInfoReportedArgs that provides details about the user interaction that triggered the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderErrors
member.summary: This optional interface is implemented by Windows feed providers to receive callbacks from the feeds host for feed errors.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderErrors.OnErrorInfoReported(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedErrorInfoReportedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the feeds host reports a feed error.
member.param: A FeedErrorInfoReportedArgs that provides details about the error that triggered the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderMessage
member.summary: This optional interface can be implemented by a feed provider to receive string messages from the feed's content that has been posted using the window.chrome.webview.postMessage JavaScript method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedProviderMessage.OnMessageReceived(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedMessageReceivedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the feed's content posts a message using the window.chrome.webview.postMessage JavaScript method.
member.param: A FeedMessageReceivedArgs that provides details about the message that triggered the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedResourceProvider
member.summary: This optional interface can be implemented by a feed provider to monitor, provide, or alter resources that are requested by the feed web content.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.IFeedResourceProvider.OnResourceRequested(Microsoft.Windows.Widgets.Feeds.Providers.FeedResourceRequestedArgs)
member.summary: Raised when the feed's content requests a resource that matches the web request filter string for a feed in the WebRequestFilter attribute of the Definition element in the provider's package manifest file. For more information, see Feed provider package manifest XML format.
member.param: A FeedResourceRequestedArgs containing information about the resource request.
